credit_line: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
title: Isaac Mizrahi: Tie-on Tag
description: Isaac Mizrahi, in black Bodoni capitals, with the initial letters of both names in larger type, is centered on the white tag. Accessories, in smaller and lighter sans serif style capitals, is centered in the lower half. A black string, inserted in a small punched hole, centered near the top edge of the tag, is tied in a knot near the open end of the string.
name: tag
